mapper.sql: EO.f_id as EOid,EO.f_order_no as EOorderNo,EO.f_buyer_id as EObuyerId,EO.f_curr_room_id as EOcurrRoomId,EO.f_gb_id as EOgbId,date_format(EO.f_buy_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EObuyTime,EO.f_amount as EOamount,EO.f_amount_point as EOamountPoint,EO.f_total_coupon_amount as EOtotalCouponAmount,EO.f_status as EOstatus,EO.f_type as EOtype,EO.f_total_delivery_fee as EOtotalDeliveryFee,EO.f_pay_method as EOpayMethod,date_format(EO.f_pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EOpayTime,date_format(EO.f_refund_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EOrefundTime,EO.f_pay_status as EOpayStatus,EO.f_deliv_people_name as EOdelivPeopleName,EO.f_deliv_phone as EOdelivPhone,EO.f_deliv_address_area as EOdelivAddressArea,EO.f_deliv_address_detail as EOdelivAddressDetail,EO.f_deliv_target_type as EOdelivTargetType,EO.f_deliv_target_id as EOdelivTargetId,EO.f_delivM_name as EOdelivmName,EO.f_delivM_fee as EOdelivmFee,EO.f_creater as EOcreater,EO.f_delivM_desc as EOdelivmDesc,EO.f_deliv_status as EOdelivStatus,EO.f_logisticsName as EOlogisticsname,EO.f_logisticseCode as EOlogisticsecode,EO.f_point_type as EOpointType,EO.f_invoice_company_name as EOinvoiceCompanyName,EO.f_invoice_product_type_name as EOinvoiceProductTypeName,date_format(EO.f_sys0_add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EOsys0AddTime,date_format(EO.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EOsys0UpdTime,EO.f_client_pay_status as EOclientPayStatus,EO.f_sub_channel as EOsubChannel,EO.f_bill_type_id as EObillTypeId,EO.f_is_prop_fee as EOisPropFee,EO.f_device_id as EOdeviceId

EO1.f_id as EO1id,EO1.f_order_no as EO1orderNo,EO1.f_buyer_id as EO1buyerId,EO1.f_curr_room_id as EO1currRoomId,EO1.f_gb_id as EO1gbId,date_format(EO1.f_buy_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EO1buyTime,EO1.f_amount as EO1amount,EO1.f_amount_point as EO1amountPoint,EO1.f_total_coupon_amount as EO1totalCouponAmount,EO1.f_status as EO1status,EO1.f_type as EO1type,EO1.f_total_delivery_fee as EO1totalDeliveryFee,EO1.f_pay_method as EO1payMethod,date_format(EO1.f_pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EO1payTime,date_format(EO1.f_refund_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EO1refundTime,EO1.f_pay_status as EO1payStatus,EO1.f_deliv_people_name as EO1delivPeopleName,EO1.f_deliv_phone as EO1delivPhone,EO1.f_deliv_address_area as EO1delivAddressArea,EO1.f_deliv_address_detail as EO1delivAddressDetail,EO1.f_deliv_target_type as EO1delivTargetType,EO1.f_deliv_target_id as EO1delivTargetId,EO1.f_delivM_name as EO1delivmName,EO1.f_delivM_fee as EO1delivmFee,EO1.f_creater as EO1creater,EO1.f_delivM_desc as EO1delivmDesc,EO1.f_deliv_status as EO1delivStatus,EO1.f_logisticsName as EO1logisticsname,EO1.f_logisticseCode as EO1logisticsecode,EO1.f_point_type as EO1pointType,EO1.f_invoice_company_name as EO1invoiceCompanyName,EO1.f_invoice_product_type_name as EO1invoiceProductTypeName,date_format(EO1.f_sys0_add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EO1sys0AddTime,date_format(EO1.f_sys0_upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as EO1sys0UpdTime,EO1.f_client_pay_status as EO1clientPayStatus,EO1.f_sub_channel as EO1subChannel,EO1.f_bill_type_id as EO1billTypeId,EO1.f_is_prop_fee as EO1isPropFee,EO1.f_device_id as EO1deviceId

if.test: _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == null or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == '' or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == false or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM != true

mapper.sql: UPDATE t_ebuy_order ,f_order_no=#{orderNo} ,f_buyer_id=#{buyerId} ,f_curr_room_id=#{currRoomId} ,f_gb_id=#{gbId} ,f_buy_time=str_to_date(#{buyTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_amount=#{amount} ,f_amount_point=#{amountPoint} ,f_total_coupon_amount=#{totalCouponAmount} ,f_status=#{status} ,f_type=#{type} ,f_total_delivery_fee=#{totalDeliveryFee} ,f_pay_method=#{payMethod} ,f_pay_time=str_to_date(#{payTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_refund_time=str_to_date(#{refundTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_pay_status=#{payStatus} ,f_deliv_people_name=#{delivPeopleName} ,f_deliv_phone=#{delivPhone} ,f_deliv_address_area=#{delivAddressArea} ,f_deliv_address_detail=#{delivAddressDetail} ,f_deliv_target_type=#{delivTargetType} ,f_deliv_target_id=#{delivTargetId} ,f_delivM_name=#{delivmName} ,f_delivM_fee=#{delivmFee} ,f_creater=#{creater} ,f_delivM_desc=#{delivmDesc} ,f_deliv_status=#{delivStatus} ,f_logisticsName=#{logisticsname} ,f_logisticseCode=#{logisticsecode} ,f_point_type=#{pointType} ,f_invoice_company_name=#{invoiceCompanyName} ,f_invoice_product_type_name=#{invoiceProductTypeName} ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{sys0DelUser} ,f_client_pay_status=#{clientPayStatus} ,f_sub_channel=#{subChannel} ,f_bill_type_id=#{billTypeId} ,f_is_prop_fee=#{isPropFee} ,f_device_id=#{deviceId} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{id}

update.foreach: UPDATE t_ebuy_order ,f_order_no=#{item.orderNo} ,f_buyer_id=#{item.buyerId} ,f_curr_room_id=#{item.currRoomId} ,f_gb_id=#{item.gbId} ,f_buy_time=str_to_date(#{item.buyTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_amount=#{item.amount} ,f_amount_point=#{item.amountPoint} ,f_total_coupon_amount=#{item.totalCouponAmount} ,f_status=#{item.status} ,f_type=#{item.type} ,f_total_delivery_fee=#{item.totalDeliveryFee} ,f_pay_method=#{item.payMethod} ,f_pay_time=str_to_date(#{item.payTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_refund_time=str_to_date(#{item.refundTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_pay_status=#{item.payStatus} ,f_deliv_people_name=#{item.delivPeopleName} ,f_deliv_phone=#{item.delivPhone} ,f_deliv_address_area=#{item.delivAddressArea} ,f_deliv_address_detail=#{item.delivAddressDetail} ,f_deliv_target_type=#{item.delivTargetType} ,f_deliv_target_id=#{item.delivTargetId} ,f_delivM_name=#{item.delivmName} ,f_delivM_fee=#{item.delivmFee} ,f_creater=#{item.creater} ,f_delivM_desc=#{item.delivmDesc} ,f_deliv_status=#{item.delivStatus} ,f_logisticsName=#{item.logisticsname} ,f_logisticseCode=#{item.logisticsecode} ,f_point_type=#{item.pointType} ,f_invoice_company_name=#{item.invoiceCompanyName} ,f_invoice_product_type_name=#{item.invoiceProductTypeName} ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{item.sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{item.sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{item.sys0DelUser} ,f_client_pay_status=#{item.clientPayStatus} ,f_sub_channel=#{item.subChannel} ,f_bill_type_id=#{item.billTypeId} ,f_is_prop_fee=#{item.isPropFee} ,f_device_id=#{item.deviceId} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{item.id}

mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_ebuy_order WHERE 1=1 AND f_id IN
#{item}
